item.description:
Sign up here: bcracetoeducate.com

Hosted by the Boston College Athletic Department (Men's Ice Hockey team), this race starts and finishes on the Boston College Campus in the shadows of Doug Flutie's Heisman Trophy in front of the Yawkey Athletic Building.

Kids 1K course is contained to that area while the 5k course runs from the BC lower campus down the Boston Marathon's famed Heartbreak Hill, loops through one of Newton's exclusive neighborhoods, and then returns to lower campus.

The race includes post- race refreshments, music and kids activities which make it a great morning outing.

The kids race starts at 9:30 a.m. and the 5K race starts at 10 a.m.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: BC Race to Educate - 5k run & 1k kids fun run
